# grid search
scores = grid_search(data, cfg_list, n_test)
print(' done' )
# list top 3 configs
for cfg, error in scores[:3]:
print(cfg, error)
Listing 15.31: Example of demonstrating the grid search framework for evaluating a MLP model
conﬁgurations on the airline passengers dataset.
Running the example, we can see that there are a total of eight conﬁgurations to be evaluated
by the framework. Each conﬁg will be evaluated 10 times; that means 10 models will be created
